name: CLASHBOWL: This VR bowling game makes you feel good & relaxed fast!
summary: CLASHBOWL is the best possible VR bowling game you can ever play right from the comfort of your own location. Play bowling exactly like in real life with your friends or family and become the best possible mafioso bowling player ever. Compete against players all arround the world, collect unique bowling balls and own your own bowling house where you can customize the bowling alley as you want!
